ifrs_13_fair_value_measurement.fair_value_hierarchy_applied: Consistently applied to all FV measurements/Inconsistently applied
ifrs_13_fair_value_measurement.unobservable_inputs_disclosed: Adequately disclosed for Level 3 measurements/Insufficient disclosure
ifrs_13_fair_value_measurement.highest_best_use: Considered for non-financial assets/Not considered or disclosed
ifrs_13_fair_value_measurement.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of hierarchy application, disclosure of valuation techniques/significant inputs, and specific disclosures for Level 3 fair values.
ifrs_13_fair_value_measurement.status_reference: Fair value measurement note, accounting policies for fair value, financial instruments note

ifrs_14_regulatory_deferral_accounts.regulatory_deferral_accounts_applicable: N/A - Entity not a first-time adopter electing this exemption
ifrs_14_regulatory_deferral_accounts.reason_of_the_status: Standard is an optional exemption for first-time adopters in rate-regulated activities. Not applicable to most entities.
ifrs_14_regulatory_deferral_accounts.status_reference: Basis of preparation note, regulatory assets/liabilities note (if any)

ifrs_15_revenue_from_contracts_with_cust.performance_obligations: Distinct POBs identified/Bundling may be inappropriate
ifrs_15_revenue_from_contracts_with_cust.transaction_price_determination: Includes variable consideration, constraints considered/Determination questionable
ifrs_15_revenue_from_contracts_with_cust.allocation_to_obligations: Based on stand-alone selling prices/Allocation method not disclosed
ifrs_15_revenue_from_contracts_with_cust.revenue_recognition_timing: Over time or at a point in time, appropriately determined/Timing may be aggressive
ifrs_15_revenue_from_contracts_with_cust.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of the rigorous application of the 5-step model, correct identification of performance obligations, and completeness of disclosures.
ifrs_15_revenue_from_contracts_with_cust.status_reference: Revenue recognition note, accounting policies for revenue, contract assets/liabilities note

lessee_accounting.right_of_use_assets: Recognized for all applicable leases/Leases potentially off-balance sheet
lessee_accounting.lease_liabilities: Recognized at present value/Discount rate questionable
lessee_accounting.discount_rate_assumptions: Lessee's incremental borrowing rate used/Rate not disclosed or inappropriate
lessee_accounting.lease_term_assessment: Includes optional periods where reasonably certain/Assessment may be under/overstated
lessee_accounting.variable_lease_payments: Excluded from lease liability unless based on index/rate/Incorrectly included

ifrs_16_leases.sale_and_leaseback: Properly assessed for sale/lease treatment/Not applicable
ifrs_16_leases.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of correct identification of leases, appropriate lessee accounting (ROU assets & liabilities), and adequacy of disclosures.
ifrs_16_leases.status_reference: Leases note, accounting policies for leases, commitment notes

ifrs_17_insurance_contracts.insurance_contracts_identified: N/A - Entity is not an insurer
ifrs_17_insurance_contracts.reason_of_the_status: Standard applicable only to entities that issue insurance contracts. Not applicable to non-insurance entities.
ifrs_17_insurance_contracts.status_reference: Basis of preparation, nature of operations description

ifric_1_changes_in_existing_decommission.changes_accounting: Changes in estimate adjusted against related asset/Accounted for in P&L
ifric_1_changes_in_existing_decommission.asset_retirement_obligations: Capitalized as part of PPE cost/Expensed
ifric_1_changes_in_existing_decommission.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of correct treatment for changes in the decommissioning liability estimate (adjusting the related asset's carrying amount).
ifric_1_changes_in_existing_decommission.status_reference: Provisions note (decommissioning), PPE note, accounting policies for provisions

ifric_2_members_shares_in_cooperative_en.cooperative_entities_applicable: N/A - Entity is not a cooperative
ifric_2_members_shares_in_cooperative_en.reason_of_the_status: Interpretation specific to cooperative entities and their members' shares.

ifric_5_rights_to_interests_arising_from.decommissioning_funds: Entity participates in a fund/No fund participation
ifric_5_rights_to_interests_arising_from.rights_measurement: Recognized as an asset and measured appropriately/Not recognized
ifric_5_rights_to_interests_arising_from.contributions_accounting: Contributions to fund accounted for per IFRIC 5/Expensed
ifric_5_rights_to_interests_arising_from.disclosures_provided: Adequate (nature of fund, rights)/Inadequate or N/A
ifric_5_rights_to_interests_arising_from.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for rights to receive reimbursements from decommissioning funds (recognized as separate asset).
ifric_5_rights_to_interests_arising_from.status_reference: Provisions note (reference to fund), other assets note

ifric_6_liabilities_arising_from_partici.waste_electrical_equipment: Obligation exists and is provided for/Not applicable
ifric_6_liabilities_arising_from_partici.compliance_obligations: Liability recognized when obligated/Recognized at point of sale
ifric_6_liabilities_arising_from_partici.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of timing for recognizing liabilities for waste management (e.g., WEEE, batteries) – recognition point is when obligation arises.

ifric_7_applying_the_restatement_approac.hyperinflation_restatement: N/A - Entity does not operate in a hyperinflationary economy
ifric_7_applying_the_restatement_approac.reason_of_the_status: Interpretation on applying IAS 29. Only applicable if the entity reports in a hyperinflationary currency.
ifric_7_applying_the_restatement_approac.status_reference: Basis of preparation, foreign operations note

ifric_10_interim_financial_reporting_and.interim_impairment_testing: Impairment recognized at interim date if indicators exist/Not tested
ifric_10_interim_financial_reporting_and.reversal_of_impairment: Reversal only if criteria met in subsequent interim period/Reversed arbitrarily
ifric_10_interim_financial_reporting_and.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of impairment recognition and reversal rules specific to interim reporting.
ifric_10_interim_financial_reporting_and.status_reference: Interim financial report notes, impairment note in interim statements

ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.service_concession_arrangements: Entity is an operator/grantor in such arrangements/Not applicable
ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.operator_accounting: Recognizes financial asset or intangible asset/Accounting unclear
ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.grantor_accounting: N/A (grantor accounting not within IFRS scope)/N/A
ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.intangible_asset_recognition: If model applies, asset recognized/Not recognized
ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.financial_asset_recognition: If model applies, asset recognized/Not recognized
ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of operator accounting for service concessions (e.g., PPPs) – recognition of a financial asset or an intangible asset.
ifric_12_service_concession_arrangements.status_reference: Intangible assets note, receivables note, revenue recognition note

ifric_14_ias_19_limit_on_defined_benefit.defined_benefit_asset_limit: Considered in measuring defined benefit asset/Not considered
ifric_14_ias_19_limit_on_defined_benefit.minimum_funding_requirements: Impact on asset recognition assessed/Not assessed
ifric_14_ias_19_limit_on_defined_benefit.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of the interaction between minimum funding requirements and the limit on recognizing a defined benefit asset.
ifric_14_ias_19_limit_on_defined_benefit.status_reference: Employee benefits (defined benefit) note, pension fund agreements

ifric_16_hedges_of_net_investment_in_for.net_investment_hedging: Hedge accounting applied to net investment/Not applied
ifric_16_hedges_of_net_investment_in_for.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of hedge accounting for net investments in foreign operations, including effectiveness testing and OCI treatment.
ifric_16_hedges_of_net_investment_in_for.status_reference: Hedge accounting note, foreign currency note, other comprehensive income statement

ifric_17_distributions_of_non_cash_asset.non_cash_distributions: Dividend declared payable in non-cash assets/No such distributions
ifric_17_distributions_of_non_cash_asset.fair_value_measurement: Liability measured at FV of assets to be distributed/N/A
ifric_17_distributions_of_non_cash_asset.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for dividends declared to be settled in non-cash assets (measured at fair value of assets to be distributed).
ifric_17_distributions_of_non_cash_asset.status_reference: Dividends note, equity note, related party transactions (if applicable)
